segments.text: Good evening . My wife and I would like a room , please . Is there any room available ? We don't have a reservation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . Yes , we have one room left . You're lucky . It's the last one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . We're tired after driving all day , and we're looking forward to relaxing in a comfortable room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This room has two double beds . It's number 56 at the rear of the motel . It's quite a comfortable room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much is it for one night ? We only need it for tonight . We're going to continue our trip in the morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's forty-five dollars a night for two . Is anyone else traveling with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it's just the two of us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to pay for the room in cash or with a credit card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Credit card . We don't like to carry much cash with us on our trips .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please fill out this registration card . Here is your key . You can park your car in front of our room.Check - out time is noon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , sir . Enjoy your stay with us .
segments.speaker: S1
